fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Education and training, Environment, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: AQUACHIM AD follows activities and legislation in the areas of public health, pharmaceuticals, food safety, environment, trade, innovation and research.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: AQUACHIM AD relies on transparency and high ethical standards when communicating with the public, policy makers and/or other companies. Events are usually organized in cooperation with business partners or competitors which are involved in the initiatives of professional trade chambers, associations and societies our company is a member of.
